description: This function returns the error number of the error that caused the CATCH block of a TRYâ€¦CATCH construct to execute.
sample:
BEGIN TRY  
    -- Generate a divide-by-zero error.  
    SELECT 1/0;  
END TRY  
BEGIN CATCH  
    SELECT ERROR_NUMBER() AS ErrorNumber;  
END CATCH;  
GO  

-----------

(0 row(s) affected)

ErrorNumber
